title: Action Learning-Based Service Improvement and Organizational Development Project

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Process for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to lead service improvement projects based on real-world field experience

learning_goals: Learners can identify and implement two or more actual organizational service improvement tasks using action learning techniques
Learners can derive actionable solutions by revising and supplementing improvement plans three or more times based on peer feedback
Learners can analyze at least five growth points at individual and organizational levels by maintaining weekly reflective journals throughout the project period.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
